overview:
I have been in all aspects of the real estate business for the last six years. Over the years I have been able to experience all aspects of the real estate business. I have given a unique perspective on the needs of a home and what an investment property looks like for each of my clients. Being a real estate advisor, I have an eye for what to avoid and what is not an issue and now as an agent Iâ€™m here to remove the pain of the home buying or selling process.

I specialize in the California areas. We sell homes in all of La Jolla, but these areas are where we focus our business. This allows us to ‘own’ the neighborhood and get a great feel for the market trends.

You can put all of my experience to work for you with one simple call. I will help you that the pain out of the real estate process. Our Business is YOU!

Visit our website at http://www.MiddletonandAssociates.com to get the latest on La Jolla Homes for Sale blogs and Real Estate news.
